message.content:
Let $a$, $b$, and $c$ denote the original portions of Al, Betty, and Clare, respectively. We have the equations
\begin{align*}
a + b + c &= 1000, \\
a - 100 + 2b + 2c &= 1500,
\end{align*}which we can rewrite as
\begin{align*}
a + b + c &= 1000, \\
a + 2b + 2c &= 1600.
\end{align*}We can eliminate $a$ by subtracting the equations, to get
\[b + c = 600.\]Then $a = 400.$  Hence, Al's original portion is $\boxed{\$400}.$
